description: Serve this warm potato salad at your next barbecue. Itâ€™s sure to be a crowd-pleaser with the addition of bacon and honey mustard dressing.
name: German-Style Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g middle bacon rashers, fat trimmed, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook potatoes in boiling salted water for 15 minutes or until tender. Cool slightly, then slice and layer into a serving dish.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add bacon and cook, stirring often, for 8 minutes or until golden. Transfer bacon to paper towel-lined plate to drain.

Add onion to pan and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until soft. Add vinegar, 1/3 cup water, mustard, honey and salt flakes. Bring to the boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes or until mixture is reduced by half. Add bacon and stir to combine.
Pour sauce mixture over potato, sprinkle with dill and season. Serve warm.
